name: Fear and Loathing in Outer Space
name_original: Fear and Loathing in Outer Space
description:
CW: Textual descriptions of intense violence.

Rise, my apprentice.

The time has come for you to recruit an apprentice and train them in the ways of space magic. You're evil, and so of course must be your pupil. Will you bond with them over a game of Treats and Talismans or will you teach them the proper way to torture?  Train them well, or they will turn from asset to danger before they've even left the crib.

  • Abduct Recruit one of infinitely many randomly generated apprentices
  • Train your apprentice lest they become grist for the Imperial mill
  • Trust that they will do as they're told
  • Send them on dozens of missions to test their worthiness
  • Be the parent you stole them from that they never had
